You need to have Mobile Data or Wi-Fi to use the application. \n\nPress dismiss to exit or Settings to turn on your internet
Due to legal restrictions, YouTube content cannot be downloaded. \n\nPlease download from other websites.
How to download from Instagram
Open the Android Download Manager app to start the Instagram service. Minimize the app and open your Instagram app.
Choose the photo you want to download and tap the three dots on the right side of the username
On the popup menu, Tap on copy link to autodownload the image, video or stories
Open the Android Download Manager app and navigate to browser. Choose one of the bookmarked options or tap the search bar and type your preferred URL.
Play your video of choice. Tap the button on the bottom right to see download options
Set your preferred name for your file and tap on queue download
On the browser page tap the download button next to the search bar
